biotools.summary: Using molecular dynamics trajectories, analyzes inter-residue contacts, creates videos of time-resolved contact maps, and performs correlation, principal component, and cluster analysis, revealing how specific contacts relate to functionally relevant states sampled by molecular dynamics.

bioschemas.name: CONAN
